name: Level Up Simulator
description:
A vast majority of people love to trade trading cards, whether it is in real life or virtual cards, this makes level-up simulator perfect for you!

Buy, sell, trade, and craft cards to level up, unlock more methods of trading to profit more, and level up further!

Key features of the game:
  • Level System
  • Currency System
  • Buy and Sell Trading Cards
  • Buy and Sell Foil Trading Cards
  • Card Bots
  • Foil Card Bots
  • Trash Bot
  • Key Bot
  • Stat Tracking
  • Dynamic Pricing (Keep track of the market price, if not you may lose money)
  • Steam Achievements

Unfortunately, Steam trading cards cant be added right now, but they are made and ready to be added once I am allowed
